Translations.Text: yetiya chu'a'ibe sihamtaka kaichila, ‘tomaloke takbaraa aralambana nakaraibane
‘niscaya ma'i tomalokara babe ejana bisbasta raachula
‘Eteke tomaloke allahara takbaraa aralambana karaa arau mora anugatya karaa
‘Iyara babe ma'i tomalokara ocarata kono pratidana nibicarao, mora pratidana kerala srstijagatara raba (allaha)ra ocarata
‘Tomaloke ojana karaomte paraipurna ojana karaiba, yibilake ojanata kama diye tomaloke sihamtara antarbhukta naha’ba
‘Arau manuhaka sihamtara praapya bastu kama nidiba arau prthiraita biparyaya srsti karai nuphuraiba
‘Arau se'i sattara takbaraa aralambana karaa yijane tomalokaka arau tomalokara purbarartisakalaka srsti karaiche’
‘Tumi dekhuna amara darae'i ejana manuha, arau ami tomaka michaliyabilakara antarbhukta buli bharao
‘Eteke tumi yadi satyabadi horaa, tente akasara eta tukuraa amara oparata pela'i diya’
Te'om ka’le, ‘mora pratipalake'i bhaladarae jane tomaloke yi karaa’
Eteke sihamte te'omka asbikara karaile. Phalata sihamtaka meghacchanna dinara sastiye graasa karaile. Niscaya eya achila eta bhisana dinara sasti
Niscaya iyata ache nidarsana, kintu sihamtara sarahabhage'i mumina nahaya
Arau tomara raba, niscaya te'om mahaparaakramasali, parama dayalu
